markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Calculate Threats](/Actions.aspx?ID=1225) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Psyche" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=429" />
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 16</row>

</column>

---

Your subconscious automatically calculates vectors and forces when your mind is unleashed, showing you the likely path of incoming attacks to avoid. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves until the beginning of your next turn.
name: Calculate Threats
